<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Ruby Resurrection](/Feats.aspx?ID=2752) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 76</row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
You would be reduced to 0 Hit Points.

</column>

---

In a burst of flame, you return to health like a [phoenix](/Monsters.aspx?ID=330) rising from the ashes. Change your current Hit Points to 30 and cast a 6th-level [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119) centered on yourself. This fireball doesn't affect you. Your hair turns brilliant red for 1 hour.

 If you haven't used Ruby Resurrection and you die, you stay in initiative order and Ruby Resurrection triggers automatically at the start of your next turn, bringing you back to life at 0 HP before having its normal effects. This happens only if there are some remains to resurrect; for instance, if you were killed by [_disintegrate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=76) you wouldn't return.

**Special** This feat has the trait corresponding to the tradition of spells you cast.

<title level="2">Capstone Feats</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 75</row>

Player characters can select one of the following new class feats for their 20th-level class feat upon entering the _Glass Lighthouse_ or by meditating on the cushion in area H4.

**Related Feats**: [All the Time in the World](/Feats.aspx?ID=2744), [Dance of Intercession](/Feats.aspx?ID=2745), [Demon's Hair](/Feats.aspx?ID=2746), [Everdistant Defense](/Feats.aspx?ID=2747), [Extradimensional Stash](/Feats.aspx?ID=2748), [Head of the Night Parade](/Feats.aspx?ID=2749), [Heart of the Kaiju](/Feats.aspx?ID=2750), [Plum Deluge](/Feats.aspx?ID=2751), [Scapegoat Parallel Self](/Feats.aspx?ID=2753), [Sever Space](/Feats.aspx?ID=2754), [Time Dilation Cascade](/Feats.aspx?ID=2755), [Vitality-Manipulating Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2756), [Vivacious Afterimage](/Feats.aspx?ID=2757), [Whirlwind Toss](/Feats.aspx?ID=2758), [Worldsphere Gravity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2759)
